p: One of the most important elements in plant tissue culture is carbon, as carbon plays a vital role as a source of energy and it controls the osmotic pressure of basal media. Sucrose is one of the most commonly used carbon sources in plant tissue culture due to its availability and cheaper price than other sugars.
